short_description: mcclurg's jewellers is a watches & jewelry store based in napier, new zealand.
long_description: collaborate with our expert designers and master jewellers to craft a bespoke design that's uniquely yours. from concept to creation, we guide you through every step of the journey, ensuring a piece that reflects your own personal style and tells your story. at mcclurgs, every bespoke journey begins with a personal consultation, where we take the time to truly understand your desires. whether you're seeking a piece to commemorate a special moment or an heirloom to be passed down, this initial stage allows us to capture the essence of your vision. we know that each piece of jewellery tells a unique story so we invite you to share your inspirations, be it a cherished memory, a beloved gemstone, or a particular design era. together, we'll explore your preferences in style, metals, and gemstones, while offering our expertise and insights to refine your ideas. whether through hand-drawn sketches, digital models, or 3d prints, this step brings your idea to life. each piece is carefully shaped, set, and polished by skilled hands.
generated_description: mcclurgs jewellers is a family-owned business based in hawke's bay, new zealand, specializing in fine jewellery. established in 1914 by leonard mcclurg, the company has a long-standing reputation for creating bespoke engagement rings and other jewellery pieces. mcclurgs jewellers offers a wide range of ethically sourced diamond and coloured gemstone jewellery, as well as custom-made pieces. the company prides itself on its exceptional service, traditional craftsmanship, and commitment to customer satisfaction. with over 185 years of combined experience, their team of expert designers and master jewellers work closely with clients to create unique and personalized jewellery.
